# Winter (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|

**Granted Power:** During the winter season, you gain a +2 sacred bonus on all Wisdom-based skill checks. 

**Winter Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Snowsight (Spell)|Snowsight]]****:** Normal vision in winter weather conditions.

**2** **[[Snow Walk (Spell)|Snow Walk]]****:** Increase your speed and walk effortlessly on top of snow without leaving tracks or scent.

**3 [[Winter's Embrace (Spell)|Winterâ€™s Embrace]]:** Creature takes 1d8 cold damage/round and might become [[Exhausted|exhausted]].

**4** **[[Ice Storm (Spell)|Ice Storm]]****:** Hail deals 5d6 damage in cylinder 40 ft. across.

**5** **[[Blizzard (Spell)|Blizzard]]****:** Temperature drops and powerful blizzard reduces visibility to zero.

**6** **[[Death Hail (Spell)|Death Hail]]****:** Summons a storm of death hail.

**7** **[[Control Weather (Spell)|Control Weather]]****:** Changes weather in local area.

**8** **[[Summon Giants (Spell)|Summon Giants]]** (Frost Giants Only): Summons outsider giants to fight for you.

**9** **[[Fimbulwinter (Spell)|Fimbulwinter]]** **<sup>X</sup>:** Creates winter weather for miles around you that lasts for months.
